content.query:
use logical_DWH_nyc_taxi go

if OBJECT_id('silver.payment_type') is not null 
    drop EXTERNAL table silver.payment_type go


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.payment_type 
    with(
        LOCATION = 'silver_layer/payment_type',
        DATA_SOURCE = logical_DWH_exDS,
        FILE_FORMAT = parquert_file
    )as select * from bronze.view_payment_type go 

select * from silver.payment_type go
